String.string: There might be something useful there.
We may have uncovered something important here.
Find the {@Rgn:47013$$Old Scout Camp} on the road north of the {@Rgn:47009$$Temporary Patrol Camp}.
Open the {@WorkObject:111$$broken supply crate}, and take what's inside.
Report the result to {@creature:247#1021$$Shannow} at the {@Rgn:47009$$Temporary Patrol Camp}.
